last_episode_to_air.name: Premiere Part 1
last_episode_to_air.overview: Nat must find a date for the premiere of the band's motion picture; a mysterious figure with a grudge against the band vows to ruin the premiere.

name: The Naked Brothers Band
overview:
The Naked Brothers Band is an American musical comedy series created by Polly Draper. The show depicts the daily lives of Draper's sons, who lead a fictional world-renowned rock band from New York City. As a mockumentary, the storyline is a hyperbole of their real lives, and the fictional presence of a camera is often acknowledged. Lead vocals and instrumentation are provided by the siblings; they wrote the lyrics themselves. The show stars Nat Wolff and Alex Wolff, who encounter conflicts with each other that are later omitted. Nat's fictional female admirer and real life preschool friends—including the guitarist who had no prior acquaintance with the family—feature as the band members, with the siblings' genuine father and Draper's husband as their accordion-playing dad and Draper's niece as the group's babysitter.

The series is a spin-off of Draper's 2005 film of the same name that was picked up by Nickelodeon, premiering in January 2007. Draper, star of Thirtysomething and her writings The Tic Code and Getting Into Heaven, is the executive producer of the series, and often writer and director. Albie Hecht, affiliated with Nickelodeon and founder of Spike TV, is the executive producer, under his Worldwide Biggies tag. Draper's husband Michael Wolff, of The Arsenio Hall Show fame, serves as the music supervisor and co-executive producer with Draper's brother Tim as the consulting producer.

seasons.name: VMA's
seasons.overview: The Naked Brothers Band get nominated for their first Video Music Awards. However, Alex Wolff is scared of his horoscope.

episodes.name: VMAS
episodes.overview: The Naked Brothers Band get nominated for their first Video Music Awards. However, Alex Wolff is scared of his horoscope.

episodes.name: Wolff Brothers Cry Wolf
episodes.overview: Nat tries to win Roselina's heart by faking real emotions.

episodes.name: Nat Is a Stand Up Guy
episodes.overview: Nat tries his hand at stand-up comedy to prove he has a sense of humor.

episodes.name: Fishing for Love
episodes.overview: The band takes a day off and goes to the beach.

episodes.name: Alex's Clothing Line
episodes.overview: Alex's look inspires a clothing line; the band must catch up on schoolwork before Principal Schmoke visits.

episodes.name: Puberty
episodes.overview: Nat believes that he is going through puberty; Alex tries to convince Jesse that he is old enough to date her.

episodes.name: A Rebel and a Skateboard
episodes.overview: Jesse dates all three of the Timmerman brothers, depressing Alex.

episodes.name: A Man Needs a Maid
episodes.overview: Cooper suggests that the children hire a maid while their father is away for the weekend.

episodes.name: First Kiss (On the Lips That Is)
episodes.overview: Nat and Rosalina discover that they are supposed to kiss in their new music video.

episodes.name: The Song
episodes.overview: Alex asks Nat to write a song for his new friend, Juanita; the boys' father announces that he and Betty will marry.

episodes.name: Battle of the Bands Part 1 (TV Movie)
episodes.overview: The band competes against a rival in a charity event; Rosalina falls for the lead singer of the L.A. Surfers.

episodes.name: Battle of the Bands Part 2
episodes.overview: A teenage band (Nat Wolff, Alex Wolff, Thomas Batuello) prepares to compete with an edgier group for a charity event, while the bassist threatens to quit.

episodes.name: Alien Clones
episodes.overview: Alex takes the concept of the band's video to heart and believes that he is surrounded by alien clones.

1.name: VMA's
1.overview: The Naked Brothers Band get nominated for their first Video Music Awards. However, Alex Wolff is scared of his horoscope.

episodes.name: Sidekicks Part 1
episodes.overview: Conflicting school dances cause problems for the band.

episodes.name: Sidekicks Part 2
episodes.overview: Conflicting school dances cause problems for the band.

episodes.name: Great Trip
episodes.overview: David wins a trip for three to a water park and chooses Nat and Dad to go with him.

episodes.name: Three Is Enough
episodes.overview: Nat invites Rosalina to go on a double date with him.

episodes.name: The Talk Show
episodes.overview: Nat and Alex fill in as celebrity talk-show hosts.

episodes.name: The Bar Mitzvah
episodes.overview: Alex meets a skateboarder who looks like him, and they decide to trade places.

episodes.name: Uncle Miles
episodes.overview: Nat and Alex begin to idolize their Uncle Miles when he comes to visit.

episodes.name: Concert Special No. 2
episodes.overview: The band performs some of their songs including "Motormouth," "Taxi Cab," "Great Trip," "Crazy Car," "Banana Smoothie," "I'll Do Anything," and "Run."

episodes.name: Everybody's Cried at Least Once
episodes.overview: Everyone deals with last-minute stresses as the band prepares to leave on tour; Nat and Alex try to cheer up their father after his breakup with Betty.

episodes.name: Cleveland
episodes.overview: Nat needs additional bodyguards to protect him on the tour; Thomas tires of Nat's getting all of the attention.

episodes.name: The County Fair
episodes.overview: The band dresses in disguise in order to get out and have some fun at a fair.

episodes.name: County Fair Concert Special
episodes.overview: The band performs songs in front of a crowd of fans at a county fair.

episodes.name: Polar Bears Part 1 (Movie)
episodes.overview: The band stops in New Orleans on tour; Alex is inspired to take a stand against global warming; Rosalina is jealous of potential competition

episodes.name: Polar Bears Part 2
episodes.overview: The band stops in New Orleans on tour; Alex is inspired to take a stand against global warming; Rosalina is jealous of potential competition.

episodes.name: Polar Bears Part 3
episodes.overview: The band stops in New Orleans on tour; Alex is inspired to take a stand against global warming; Rosalina is jealous of potential competition.

episodes.name: Mystery Girl Part 1
episodes.overview: The band is making a motion picture; Nat tries to figure out why Rosalina is sabotaging herself on the set; Alex learns that the script calls for him to kiss Juanita.

episodes.name: Mystery Girl Part 2
episodes.overview: The band is making a motion picture; Nat tries to figure out why Rosalina is sabotaging herself on the set; Alex learns that the script calls for him to kiss Juanita.

episodes.name: Operation Mojo Part 1
episodes.overview: After Nat sees a tabloid photo of Rosalina kissing another boy, Alex takes him on a wilderness vacation to cheer him up.

episodes.name: Operation Mojo Part 2
episodes.overview: After Nat sees a tabloid photo of Rosalina kissing another boy, Alex takes him on a wilderness vacation to cheer him up.

episodes.name: Supertastic 6
episodes.overview: The band's superhero alter egos must stop a jazz-playing criminal genius from stealing the world's hair supply.

episodes.name: Christmas Special
episodes.overview: Nat needs to shake his gloom and find Christmas spirit before a Save the Children benefit.

episodes.name: Valentine Dream Date
episodes.overview: Cooper convinces Nat to be a contestant for a Valentine's Day dream date with Victoria Justice; Alex helps Jesse reconcile with her long lost love

episodes.name: Naked Idol Part 1
episodes.overview: The band conducts a nationwide competition to find a new bass player after Rosalina quits the band.

episodes.name: Naked Idol Part 2
episodes.overview: The band conducts a nationwide competition to find a new bass player after Rosalina quits the band.

episodes.name: No Schools Fool's Day
episodes.overview: The band holds a competition to see who can perform the best prank on their fellow band members; Alex boasts that he is the greatest drummer in the world.
